Posts.Content: Jul 24, 2010 09:06AM MizMo wrote: Hi, I started chemo June 23 - AC every 2 weeks - 4 times.  I have different cancers in each breast - right breast IDC Stage 1 Grade 3 No lymph nodes involved found 5/3/10 and left breast DCIS Stage 1 found 5/24/10- so I had bi-lateral mastectomies on 6/10/10, with start of reconstruct that has been halted until I finish the chemo.  I wish all of you well and God Bless -
